title: Favela Family Day - FREE Team Rowing & KIDS Wrestling
time: SATURDAY AT 8:30 AM UTC+07 – 1 PM UTC+07
description:
Water Festival is almost here! There might not be any boats or races on the river this year but that doesn’t mean we can’t ROW like crazy.
Come down to Favela for a fun, family friendly Saturday. We’ll be hosting a team rowing event AND a free kids wrestling session (ages 5-12). We’ll also be offering some fun prizes and membership discounts.
After a good workout and some snackage, we’ll walk over to Two Birds Craft Brewery for their Oktoberfeast event and some more fun at the Factory.
RSVP here and let us know if you'd like to join the team row or sign your child up for the wrestling clinic.
We'll see you there!

SCHEDULE
Saturday - OCTOBER 17
8:45 AM - Warm up
9:00 AM - Adults: Team Rowing Event
10:00 AM - Kids: Wrestling 101
11:00 AM - Open gym / open mat
11:30 AM - Paella & drinks
1:00 PM - Head to Two Birds Brewery for Oktoberfeast

WHAT TO BRING
Workout clothes, water bottle, towel
Shower stuff if you want to shower
Dogs (on leashes please!)

title: TwoBirds October Feast
description:
IT'S TIME FOR OUR ANNUAL OCTOBER FEAST!
We are back bigger and better than ever and are finally able to host this spectacular festival in our very own brewery!

What you can expect this year:
- FREE ENTRY
- LIVE BAND PERFORMANCES
- DJ MARIE THACH
- GUEST DJ's GINNEL
- TRADITIONAL BEER GAMES
- PREMIUM GERMAN CRAFT BEER
- GERMAN BBQ
- MALAYSIAN FOOD
- BURGERS
- KHMER FOOD
- SNACKS
- CRICKETS
- PHOTO CORNER
... AND ...
!!! $20 FREE FLOW BEER FLATRATE STARTING AT 1PM FOR THE ENTIRE EVENT !!!
(this includes all beers, ciders and soft drinks)
---
COVID-19 Prevention:
- Temperatures will be taken at the door
- Free masks will be given out
- Free sanitizer will be given out
- Names and phone numbers will be documented upon entry

title: Skill Session : Negotiation 101
time: SATURDAY, OCTOBER 24, 2020 AT 9:30 AM UTC+07 – 10:30 AM UTC+07
description:
Skill Session
(English below)
តើអ្នកដឹងទេថា ប្រសិនបើអ្នកដឹងពីរបៀបចរចា អ្នកអាចស្ងែងរកដំណោះស្រាយដ៏ល្អទោះនៅក្នុងបរិបទរឺស្ថានការណ៏ណាក៏ដោយ?
ការចរចារគឺជាកិច្ចពិភាក្សាមួយបែបដែលដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាក្នុងរបៀបមួយដែលភាគីទាំងពីរយល់ថាអាចទទួលយកបាន។ អ្នកចរចាល្អអាចដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាមួយតាមរបៀបដែលផ្តល់ផលប្រយោជន៍ដល់ភាគីទាំងសងខាង។
ប៉ុន្តែមិនមែនគ្រប់គ្នាសុទ្ធតែដឹងពីរបៀបដើម្បីចរចារកិច្ចព្រមព្រៀងឲ្យល្អសម្រាប់ខ្លួនគេឬអាជីវកម្មរបស់ពួកគេទេ។ ការដឹងពីរបៀបចរចានឹងជួយអ្នកឱ្យបង្កើតទំនាក់ទំនងបានល្អប្រសើរខណៈពេលដែលផ្តល់ដំណោះស្រាយប្រកបដោយគុណភាព និង យូរអង្វែង។
កម្មវិធី Skill-Session ដែលរៀបចំដោយ Workspace 1 គឺជា Workshop ទ្រង់ទ្រាយតូច ដែលមានភាព ច្នៃប្រឌិត ហើយតែងតែនាំយកអ្នកជំនាញនៅក្នុងវិស័យផ្សេងៗមកចូលរួមចែករំលែកចំណេះដឹង។ សំរាប់ Skill-Session នៅក្នុងខែនេះ យើងនឹងជួបជាមួយលោក ហ៊ុយ សម្បត្តិ ដែលលោកនឹងចែករំលែកពីវិធីសាស្រ្តក្នុងការចរចារដើម្បីទទលបានលទ្ធផលជាទីគាប់ចិត្តសម្រាប់ភាគីសងខាង។
ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម៖
កាលបរិច្ឆេទ៖ ថ្ងៃទី២៤ ខែតុលា ឆ្នាំ២០២០
ពេលវេលា៖ ចាប់ពីម៉ោង ៩:៣០ ដល់ម៉ោង ១២:០០
ទីតាំង៖ Workspace 1, Factory Phnom Penh
តម្លៃចូលរួម៖ $៣
វាគ្មិន៖ លោក ហ៊ុយ សម្បត្តិ ប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងសកម្មភាពអាជីវកម្ម
ភាសា៖ ខ្មែរ
ចុះឈ្មោះចូលរួមតាម link នេះ៖ https://bit.ly/2Gszpe4
(រៀបចំដោយ Workspace 1)
Workspace 1 គឺជាការិយាល័យរួមគ្នាមួយ ដែលបង្កើតឡើងដោយស្ថាបនិកដែលយល់ពីតុល្យភាពនៃជីវិតការងារ និងការកំសាន្ត។ គោលបំណងរបស់ពួកយើងគឺ ជួយអ្នកអោយបំពេញការងារអោយបានល្អដោយផ្ដល់នូវទីតាំងដ៏ល្អ, សហគមន៍ដ៏ប្រសើរ និងជាកន្លែងមានផាសុខភាព ដូចជាផ្ទះទីពីររបស់អ្នក។
សម្រាប់ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម សូមទំនាក់ទំនងមកកាន់៖
អ៉ីមែល៖ work@factoryphnompenh.com
គេហទំព័រ៖ work.factoryphnompenh.com
ទូរស័ព្ទ៖ +855 17 999 547
======================
Do you realize that you could have had better deals out of that earlier discussion if you knew how to negotiate?
Negotiation is a strategic discussion that resolves an issue in a way that both parties find acceptable. A good negotiator can resolve an issue in a way that benefits both parties. But not everyone knows how to negotiate a good deal for themselves or their business. Knowing how to negotiate will help you build better relationships while delivering quality solutions.
Skill-Session is a series of creative, short, and practical workshops that will bring an expert in a specific field. For the upcoming Skill-Session, we will be learning about Negotiation 101. Join us this month and learn from Mr. Sambath HUY, Business Activation & Promotion Manager at Prudential Cambodia. Mr. Sambath will share his tips in negotiating and help us understand the WIn-Win solution.
Event Details:
Date: 24.10.20 (Saturday)
Time: 9:30AM-12:00PM
Venue: Co-Working Space, Workspace 1
Cost: $3
Speaker: Mr. Sambath HUY, Business Activation & Promotion Manager
Language: Khmer
Registration link: https://bit.ly/2Gszpe4
(HOSTED BY WORKSPACE1)
Workspace1 is a co-working community, dreamt up by people who understand work-life-play balance. Our goal is to help you do your best work through providing a cool space, awesome community, and a home away from home (in short, a second home) for your comfort, a space you can be yourself!
(MORE INFORMATION?)
Email: work@factoryphnompenh.com
Website: work.factoryphnompenh.com
Call: +855 17 999 547

title: "Metamorphosis" Morn Chear Solo Exhibition
time: SATURDAY, OCTOBER 24, 2020 AT 6 PM UTC+07 – 9 PM UTC+07

title: STREET FIESTA by FACTORY
time: SATURDAY, NOVEMBER 7, 2020 AT 4 PM UTC+07 – 9 PM UTC+07
description:
*** កម្មវិធី - “Street Fiesta” រៀបចំដោយ Factory Phnom Penh ***
*** Event - “Street Fiesta” by Factory Phnom Penh ***
[English version below]
យើងខ្ញុំពិតជារំភើបរីករាយជាខ្លាំង ដែល Retail Street របស់យើង នឹងចាប់ផ្ដើមបើកដំណើរការឆាប់ៗនេះ!
Retail Street នៅ Factory Phnom Penh គឺទីកន្លែងសម្រាប់ សហគ្រិនជនជាតិខ្មែរវ័យក្មេង ដែលមានភាពច្នៃប្រឌិត មកបើកដំណើរការ អាជីវកម្មថ្មីរបស់ពួកគាត់។ ហាង
របស់យើង គឺត្រូវបានសាងសង់ឡើង ដោយមានការពិចារណាពីតម្រូវការរបស់ អ្នកមានគំនិតបង្កើត នូវផលិតផលប្លែកៗ នៅក្នុងស្រុក។ លោកអ្នក នឹងមិនអាចរកឃើញ គម្រោងបែបនេះ នៅកន្លែងផ្សេងឡើយ!
កម្មវិធីបើកសម្ពោធ Retail Street នេះ នឹងត្រូវបានធ្វើឡើងនៅ ថ្ងៃសៅរ៍ ទី៧ ខែវិច្ឆិកា ឆ្នាំ២០២០ ហើយក្រុមការងារ Factory បានធ្វើការរៀបចំនូវកម្មវិធី STREET FIESTA សម្រាប់ឲ្យលោកអ្នក មកលេងកំសាន្តជាមួយនឹងមនុស្សជាទីស្រឡាញ់របស់លោកអ្នក ហើយនិងស្វែងយល់ថាតើ នៅ Retail Street របស់យើង មានអ្វីពិសេសខ្លះ។
កម្មវិធី Street Fiesta នឹងមាននូវអាជីវកម្មប្លែកៗថ្មីៗជាច្រើន ដែលនឹងបើកដំណើរការ ក៏ដូចជាតូបចំណីអាហារ និងភេសជ្ជៈ តូបសិល្បៈ ការសម្ដែងផ្សេងៗ កន្លែងលេងហ្គេមកំសាន្ត និងសកម្មភាពសប្បាយៗជាច្រើនទៀត សម្រាប់ធ្វើឲ្យលោកអ្នកមិនអាចបំភ្លេចបាន នូវបទពិសោធន៍ចូលរួមកម្មវិធីមួយនេះ។
===================
We are excited to finally launch our Retail Street!
Retail Street at Factory Phnom Penh houses almost 20 unique young Cambodian businesses. Our shops were built having the makers and shakers of Cambodia in mind. There is nothing like this in the country!
This unique street is coming to LIFE on Saturday November 07, 2020, and Factory is crafting a fun FIESTA for you and your loved ones to enjoy and discover what retail street fosters.
STREET FIESTA will have many cool businesses, local food/drink vendors, artisans booths, arts, performances, game stations and just PURE FUN!
------------
EVENT DETAIL:
Date: Saturday November 07, 2020
Time: 4:00PM - 9:00PM
Venue: Factory Phnom Penh
Ticket: $1.5 (Kids 3-12 years old), $3 (Students), and $5 (Adults) - all access to games, performances, activities, plus a welcome drink!
NOTE:
Ticket available at the Factory’s entrance
Bring your student ID to get the student ticket price
Parking from Hun Sen Blvd. entrance***
TukTuk Dropoff at National Road 2 entrance***
Have a business and want to participate? Contact us via contact info below.
MORE INFO:
Tel: (+855) 10 299 921
Email: info@factoryphnompenh.com
------------
